text: yar allahvitattil ceyta vakkurutiyaiyum tam cattiyappiramanankalaiyum arpa vilaikku virkirarkalo, avarkalukku niccayamaka marumaiyil yatoru narpakkiyamum illai. Anriyum, allah avarkalutan peca mattan;. Innum iruti nalil avan avarkalai (karunaiyutan) parkkavum mattan. Avarkalaip(pavattaivittup) paricuttamakkavum mattan;. Melum avarkalukku novinaimikka vetanaiyum untu
